dev.jeka.core.api.java.project

Class JkJavaProjectSimpleFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.jeka.core.api.java.project.JkJavaProjectSimpleFacade

  • public class JkJavaProjectSimpleFacade
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple facade over JkJavaProject to access common setting conveniently.

      • addTestExcludeFilterSuffixedBy

        public JkJavaProjectSimpleFacade addTestExcludeFilterSuffixedBy(java.lang.String suffix,
                                                                boolean condition)
        By default, every classes in test folder are run. If you add a exclude filter, tests accepting this filter won't be run.
        Parameters:
        condition - : the filter will be added only if this parameter is true.

      • addTestIncludeFilterSuffixedBy

        public JkJavaProjectSimpleFacade addTestIncludeFilterSuffixedBy(java.lang.String suffix,
                                                                boolean condition)
        By default, every classes in test folder are run. If you add an include filter, only tests accepting one of the declared filters will run.
        Parameters:
        condition - : the filter will be added only if this parameter is true.

      • addTestIncludeFilterOnStandardNaming

        public JkJavaProjectSimpleFacade addTestIncludeFilterOnStandardNaming(boolean condition)
        See Also:
        Adds a test include filters for test classes named as ^(Test.*|.+[.$]Test.*|.*Tests?)$. This is a standard filter in many tools.

        public JkJavaProject getProject()
